attributes.action: urgently institute a programme to build rapidly a new generation of nuclear power stations.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nuclear power generation is carbon-free, politically much less vulnerable than reliance on imported oil or gas, and is a safe, well tried, highly developed technology. Buying established designs from the USA or France would enable a programme of building, say, 10 new nuclear power stations to be achieved within a decade and to make a major contribution to the solution of current environmental problems.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
